Video widget: provide a video container (avbin is needed.)¶

Video widget: provide a video container (avbin is needed.)

class pymt.ui.widgets.videowidget.MTVideo(**kwargs)¶

MTVideo is a video player, implemented in top of MTScatterWidget. You can use it like this

video = MTVideo(video='source_file')
Parameters:
video : stsize=iw.size, r

Filename of video
